channel.title: W3C TAG : Vote for Amy
channel.description:
If you know an AC representative of the [W3C members](https://www.w3.org/Consortium/Member/List) please tell them to rank Amy highly in the process for the 2020 election to the [W3C Technical Architecture Group (TAG)](https://www.w3.org/2001/tag/):
# [TAG nominee statement](https://rhiaro.co.uk/2020/11/tag-statement)
